de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages
Interface LanguageTranslator

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLanguageTranslator, L0LanguageTranslator, L1LanguageTranslator, L2LanguageTranslator, L3LanguageTranslator, L4LanguageTranslator
public interface LanguageTranslator

Base interface for translators that are used to translate expressions to core syntax for a given language. They are also used to test whether a specified expression is syntactic sugar for a given language.

Version:
$Rev: 277 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
Expression, Language

Method Summary
 boolean containsSyntacticSugar(Expression expression, boolean recursive)
          Tests whether the expression contains syntactic sugar according to the language for which this translator was created.
 Expression translateToCoreSyntax(Expression expression, boolean recursive)
          Translates the expression to core syntax according to the language for which this translator was created. if recursive is true the sub expressions of expression will also be translated, otherwise only the expression itself will be translated and the sub expression will be left untouched.
 

Method Detail

containsSyntacticSugar

boolean containsSyntacticSugar(Expression expression,
                               boolean recursive)
Tests whether the expression contains syntactic sugar according to the language for which this translator was created. If recursive is true, this method will return true if either expression itself is syntactic sugar or one of its sub expressions is syntactic sugar. Otherwise if recursive is false the test is only performed on the expression itself.

Parameters:
expression - the Expression to test for syntactic sugar.
recursive - whether to recursively check sub expressions of the expression as well.
Returns:
true if the expression is syntactic sugar or, if recursive is true, any of its sub expressions is syntactic sugar.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if expression is null.
See Also:
translateToCoreSyntax(Expression, boolean)

translateToCoreSyntax

Expression translateToCoreSyntax(Expression expression,
                                 boolean recursive)
Translates the expression to core syntax according to the language for which this translator was created. if recursive is true the sub expressions of expression will also be translated, otherwise only the expression itself will be translated and the sub expression will be left untouched. If the expression does not contain any syntactic sugar, the expression itself will be returned.

Parameters:
expression - the Expression to translate to core syntax.
recursive - whether to recursively translate expression to core syntax.
Returns:
expression translated to core syntax or the expression if it is already in core syntax or does not contain syntactic sugar.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if expression is null.
See Also:
containsSyntacticSugar(Expression, boolean)
